trans-unit.source: Stores linked resources to be sent as part of an email message.
trans-unit.target: Archivia le risorse collegate da inviare come parte di un messaggio di posta elettronica.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> class is returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> classe viene restituita dal <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate da <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il metodo <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> dopo aver terminato di utilizzare l'oggetto <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> lascia l'oggetto <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> in una condizione di inutilizzabilità.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> occupied.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato il metodo <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A>, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti alla classe <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> per consentire al Garbage Collector di recuperare la memoria occupata dalla classe <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: This method invokes <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A> on all views in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiama <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A> su tutte le visualizzazioni in questa raccolta.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to call it in your application.
Always call <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare sempre il metodo <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse utilizzate da <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> non vengono liberate fino a quando la procedura di Garbage Collection non chiama il metodo `Finalize` dell'oggetto.
